flavorText:
"Let the gray-hairs keep their ravens and drakes. My familiar will be a reflection of me: bloodthirsty, with a predator's instinct."
—Taivang, barbarian warlord

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Grauhaarigen sollen ruhig ihre Raben und Sceadas behalten. Mein Vertrauter ist ein Ebenbild von mir: blutdürstig und mit dem Instinkt eines Raubtiers." —Taivang, Barbaren-Kriegsfürst
foreignData.name: Schakal-Vertrauter
foreignData.text: Der Schakal-Vertraute kann weder alleine angreifen noch alleine blocken.

foreignData.flavorText: "Que los canosos se queden con sus cuervos y dracos. Mi familiar será un reflejo mío: sediento de sangre, con el instinto de un depredador." —Taivang, señor de la guerra bárbaro
foreignData.name: Familiar chacal
foreignData.text: El Familiar chacal no puede atacar ni bloquear.

foreignData.flavorText: « Laissez les corbeaux et les drakôns aux grisonnants. Mon familier sera mon parfait reflet : assoiffé de sang et doté de l'instinct du prédateur. » —Taivang, seigneur de guerre barbare
foreignData.name: Familier chacal
foreignData.text: Le Familier chacal ne peut pas attaquer ou bloquer seul.

foreignData.flavorText: "Lascia che i capelli grigi si tengano corvi e draghetti. Il mio famiglio sarà il mio riflesso: assetato di sangue, con un istinto da predatore." —Taivang, signore della guerra barbaro
foreignData.name: Sciacallo Famiglio
foreignData.text: Lo Sciacallo Famiglio non può attaccare o bloccare da solo.

foreignData.flavorText: 「白髪野郎にはカラスだのドレイクだのを預けとけばいい。 俺の使い魔は俺の鏡映しだ。血に飢えた、食う側の本能のな。」 ――蛮族の大将軍、タイヴァン
foreignData.name: ジャッカルの使い魔
foreignData.text: ジャッカルの使い魔は単独では攻撃したりブロックしたりできない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猟犬

foreignData.flavorText: "Corvos e dragonetes são para os velhotes. Meu familiar refletirá a minha personalidade: predador e sedento de sangue." —Taivang, comandante bárbaro
foreignData.name: Familiar Chacal
foreignData.text: Familiar Chacal não pode atacar nem bloquear sozinho.

foreignData.flavorText: «Пусть седовласые старцы довольствуются воронами и дрейками. Мой зверь будет мне под стать: кровожадный, с инстинктом хищника». — Тайванг, полководец варваров
foreignData.name: Прирученный Шакал
foreignData.text: Прирученный Шакал не может атаковать или блокировать в одиночку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「乌鸦与龙兽是给老家伙养的。 我的佣兽会是我的写照：嗜血，具有猎食者的本能。」 ～野蛮人军头泰方
foreignData.name: 豺狼佣兽
foreignData.text: 豺狼佣兽不能单独进行攻击或阻挡。

name: Jackal Familiar
originalText: Jackal Familiar can't attack or block alone.

rulings.text: “Can’t attack alone” means Jackal Familiar can’t be declared as an attacker during the declare attackers step unless at least one other creature is also declared as an attacker at that time (either by you or your Two-Headed Giant teammate).
“Can’t block alone” has a similar meaning. Note that the other blocker(s) doesn’t have to block the same attacker as Jackal Familiar.

Once Jackal Familiar has been legally declared as an attacking or blocking creature, how many other creatures it’s attacking or blocking with no longer matters. For example, if Jackal Familiar and Canyon Minotaur both attack, then Canyon Minotaur leaves the battlefield, Jackal Familiar continues to attack even though it’s now attacking alone.

An effect may put Jackal Familiar onto the battlefield attacking even if no other creatures are attacking. That’s because it wasn’t declared as an attacker in this case. Similarly, an effect may put Jackal Familiar onto the battlefield blocking even if no other creatures are blocking.

text: Jackal Familiar can't attack or block alone.
